tit.e: Matsukage Chunagon Monogatari (The Tale of Matsukage Middle Counsellor)
tit.cmt: 松陰中納言物語→定訳不明です
tit.e: Matsukage Chunagon Monogatari (The Tale of Matsukage Middle Counselor)
Matsukage Chunagon Monogatari (The Tale of Matsukage, Vice-councilor of state)
tit.cmt: 中納言を定訳に変更し、カンマを入れました。

sen.j: 松陰中納言物語（まつかげちゅうなごんものがたり）は、室町時代に成立したとされる作り物語。
sen.e: Matsukage Chunagon Monogatari was fictional tale completed during the Muromachi period.
Matsukage Chunagon Monogatari is a fictional tale completed during the Muromachi period.
